str2: In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Or prolonged paristano from para and histemi; to stand beside, i.e. to exhibit, proffer, recommend, substantiate; or to be at hand, aid.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Reflexive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Singular

str2: Highly esteemed, splendid, glorious. From en and doxa; in glory, i.e. Splendid, noble.
From a compound of ek and a derivative of kaleo; a calling out, i.e. a popular meeting, especially a religious congregation.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Accusative Feminine Singular
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
A spot, fault, stain, blemish. Of uncertain derivation; a stain or blemish, i.e. defect, disgrace.
Or, than. A primary particle of distinction between two connected terms; disjunctive, or; comparative, than.
A wrinkle; fig: a spiritual defect, flaw. From rhoumai; a fold, i.e. A wrinkle.
Or, than. A primary particle of distinction between two connected terms; disjunctive, or; comparative, than.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.
(including the other inflections); from toi and houtos; truly this, i.e. Of this sort (to denote character or individuality).
But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.
Set apart by (or for) God, holy, sacred. From hagos; sacred.
Blameless, without blemish, unblemished, faultless. Unblemished.
